de.uni_potsdam.hpi.bpt.bp2014.database

Class DbFragmentInstance

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_potsdam.hpi.bpt.bp2014.database.DbObject
      • de.uni_potsdam.hpi.bpt.bp2014.database.DbFragmentInstance

  • public class DbFragmentInstance
extends DbObject
    This class is the representation of a fragment instance in the database. It provides the functionality to create and terminate a fragment instance as well as checking the existence of a fragment instance.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DbFragmentInstance()

      This method checks if a fragment is present in the database.
      int getFragmentID(int fragmentinstance_id)
      This method returns the ID of the fragment the fragmentinstance belons to.
      int getFragmentInstanceID(int fragment_id, int scenarioInstance_id)
      This method gives you the fragment instance ID of a fragment from a specific scenario instance.
      void terminateFragmentInstance(int fragmentInstance_id)
      This method terminates a fragment instance.

    • Method Detail

      • existFragment

        public java.lang.Boolean existFragment(int fragment_id,
                              int scenarioInstance_id)
        This method checks if a fragment is present in the database.
        Parameters:
        fragment_id - This is the database ID of a fragment.
        scenarioInstance_id - This is the database ID of a scenario instance.
        Returns:
        true if the fragment exists else false.

      • createNewFragmentInstance

        public int createNewFragmentInstance(int fragment_id,
                            int scenarioInstance_id)
        This method creates and saves a new fragment instance to the database.
        Parameters:
        fragment_id - This is the database ID of a fragment.
        scenarioInstance_id - This is the database ID of a scenario instance.
        Returns:
        -1 if something went wrong else the database ID of the newly created fragment instance.

      • getFragmentInstanceID

        public int getFragmentInstanceID(int fragment_id,
                        int scenarioInstance_id)
        This method gives you the fragment instance ID of a fragment from a specific scenario instance.
        Parameters:
        fragment_id - This is the database ID of a fragment.
        scenarioInstance_id - This is the database ID of a scenario instance.
        Returns:
        the database ID of the fragment instance if existing else -1.

      • terminateFragmentInstance

        public void terminateFragmentInstance(int fragmentInstance_id)
        This method terminates a fragment instance.
        Parameters:
        fragmentInstance_id - This is the database ID of a fragment instance.

      • getFragmentID

        public int getFragmentID(int fragmentinstance_id)
        This method returns the ID of the fragment the fragmentinstance belons to.
        Parameters:
        fragmentinstance_id - ID of the fragmentinstance
        Returns:
        FragmentID.
